DOC.brief_summary: Transcatheter aortic valve replacement ( TAVR ) good alternative treatment patient severe aortic valve stenosis similar mid-term success rate compare surgery . Periprosthetic aortic regurgitation ( PAR ) TAVR remain important limitation technique . Moderate severe PAR occur 15-45 % case independent predictor mortality TAVR . Little known potential difference severity PAR among different type aortic valve prosthesis . The current randomized study aim evaluate potential difference Edwards SAPIEN bioprosthesis Medtronic CoreValve® system main focus PAR additional focus clinical imaging endpoint . Primary objective study investigate difference severity PAR , measure 3-dimensional transesophageal echocardiography ( 3DTEE ) , patient undergo implantation Edwards SAPIEN bioprosthesis versus patient receive Medtronic CoreValve® bioprosthesis . Secondary objective study include : investigate value different image modality evaluate periprosthetic regurgitation TAVR study difference clinical endpoint accord VARC-2 definition quality life TAVR two available aortic valve prosthesis .
DOC.brief_title: Edwards SAPIEN Periprosthetic Leakage Evaluation Versus Medtronic CoreValve Transfemoral Aortic Valve Implantation ( ELECT Trial )
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion In order eligible participate study , subject must meet following criterion : Patient ≥18 year age diagnose severe symptomatic aortic stenosis , judge inoperable high surgical risk ( EuroSCORE > 15 % criterion make surgery high risk consensus among cardiologist cardiac surgeon heart team ) deem eligible transfemoralTAVI . Aortic annulus diameter ≥ 18 ≤ 29 mm assess MSCT . No contraindication study requirement MRI TEE . Exclusion criteria Patients unable unwilling give inform consent . Patients exclude study size aortic annulus diameter .
